wikipedia_page.main: Dave Bussey (born 4 October 1952), is an English radio disc jockey who, until March 2008, presented The Dave Bussey Show on BBC Radio Lincolnshire.

response: * Dave Bussey, former BBC Radio 2 and current BBC Radio Lincolnshire presenter

* John Inverdale, presenter of national sports programmes on BBC Television and BBC Radio Five Live, started his radio career as a morning presenter from 1982 until 1985, having worked for two years at the Lincolnshire Echo. He has claimed it is the most enjoyable job he has ever had, despite the early mornings. He was replaced by Dave Bussey.
*Dave Bussey – later presented a weekend programme on BBC Radio 2, once at BBC Radio Lincolnshire
